definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hold in, restrain (Ar. xat.ima strike the nose, attach the xita0mun = camel-halter, xat.mun n. muzzle, nose of beast; NH [[חֲטָם]] nose-ring of camel, [[חוֹטָם]]; Aram. [[חוּטְמָא]] nose; cf. [[חטם]], Inscr. Zinj.; acc. to DHM:Sendsch. 34, of taming wild beasts)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[אֶחֱטָם־לָָךְ]] :[[לְבִלְתִּי הַכְרִיתֶֽךָ ]] Is 48:9 I will restrain for thee (mine anger), not to cut thee off (‖[[אַאֲרִיח אַפִּי]]).
